page.title: 01GREEN AND PLEASANT LAND
page.content: This area of Dorset is part of the most beautiful landscape of England. Small villages and hamlets nestle in the curve of the hills while the river Stour winds its way along the valley. Small streams trickle down the hillside to join it and provide habitats for a wide variety of plants and creatures. The villages and hamlets seem to have taken life slowly, showing little outward change. Yet people are living here, developing and changing ,and their homes, their lifestyle and their environment reflect this . Tourists come to gaze at the beauty of these places, and to enjoy the peace and tranquillity of the countryside. We who live here can also enjoy all this, but for us it is forever changing, and we are part of this change.
